title: Touch issue with Android 10 on pixel 3 xl
content:
Just updated my pixel 3 xl to android 10 and faced an issue with touch calibration. 

On homescreen, the bottom row icons aren't very responsive to touch. If i touch any of these icons, it doesn't work. I have to touch a little bit above the icons to make it work.

I have made a video . Please watch and solve the issue:

https://youtu.be/reOq33yTDNw
